text: Boolela batong’anga inyuma mubamenyi bomumasokholio “baduwi” mwitsa okhulangwa mulwane nende Abandu ba amani po, mulwane ninabo nohomba balonde amalako, ne nimuwulila mwaloonda Nyasaye alabarunga omurongo omulayi, ne nimukhaya shinga mwaranjilila okhukhaya, Nyasaye alabaha eshinyasio eshilulu
